charges.charge_disposition: Custody of BOP for term of 192 MONTHS, with credit for time served. The term consists of 108 MONTHS on Counts 1-6, all counts to run concurrently and 84 MONTHS on Count 8 to served consecutively to all other sentences: upon release placed on supervised release for term of 60 MONTHS. The term consists of 36 MONTHS on Counts 1-4 and 60 MONTHS in each of Counts 5, 6 and 8, all terms to run concurrently: SPECIAL ASSESSMENT in the amount of $700.00: RESTITUTION in the amount of $27,528.00
